item.title: Here are the Monster Hunter Wilds Event Quests for March 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/03/05/here-are-the-monster-hunter-wilds-event-quests-for-march-2025/

Monster Hunter Wilds is out and there will be a string of in-game events to help you upgrade your character are collect some goodies.  Here is the Monster Hunter Wilds Event Quests  schedule for March 2025.

04/0/4/25 – 11/03/35

Kut-Ku Gone Cuckoo : Gather special materials to obtain the Mimiphyta α headgear!

  • Locales: Scarlet Forest
  • Conditions: HR 9 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Yian Kut-Ku
  • Start Date and Time: 03.04.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 03.18.2025 15:59

Stalking Supper: An event quest for gathering Kunafa Cheese that you can use as an additional ingredient when cooking on the BBQ Grill!

  • Locales: Windward Plains
  • Conditions: HR 9 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Quematrice
  • Start Date and Time: 03.04.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 03.11.2025 15:59

11/03/35 – 18/03/25

Tongue-Tied: An event quest for gathering Hard Armor Spheres and Advanced Armor Spheres for upgrading your armor!

  • Locales: Windward Plains
  • Conditions: HR 21 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Tempered Chatacabra
  • Start Date and Time: 03.11.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 03.18.2025 15:59

Kut-Ku Gone Cuckoo : Gather special materials to obtain the Mimiphyta α headgear!

  • Locales: Scarlet Forest
  • Conditions: HR 9 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Yian Kut-Ku
  • Start Date and Time: 03.04.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 03.18.2025 15:59

18/03/25 – 25/03025

Ballet in the Rain: An event quest for gathering Glowing Orb – Swords to use as decorations for customizing your weapon skills!

  • Locales: Scarlet Forest
  • Conditions: HR 21 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Tempered Lala Barina
  • Start Date and Time: 03.18.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 03.25.2025 15:59

Sand-Scarred Soul: An event quest for gathering Glowing Orb – Armors to use as decorations for customizing your armor skills!

  • Locales: Windward Plains
  • Conditions: HR 9 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Doshaguma
  • Start Date and Time: 03.18.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 03.25.2025 15:59

Like a Fire Hidden by Sand: Gather special material to obtain the Expedition Headgear α, a piece of equipment based on the emblem of the expedition!

  • Locales: Windward Plains
  • Conditions: HR 9 or higher
  • Completion Conditions: Hunt the Rathian
  • Start Date and Time: 03.18.2025 16:00
  • End Date and Time: 04.01.2025 15:59

That’s your Monster Hunter Wilds Event Quests for this month, but why not check out our review of the game.

Source: Capcom

item.title: Sony centralise their Beta tests with a new service, you can sign up now
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/03/05/sony-centralise-their-beta-tests-with-a-new-service-you-can-sign-up-now/

Over the years, Sony have had many beta programs for the various services and games but now they have decided to streamline the process and have one beta program for everything: games, system updates, even the PlayStation App.

“I’m pleased to introduce the Beta Program at PlayStation initiative, ” said Sid Shurman on the PlayStation Blog. “It’s an easier, more consolidated way for gamers to sign up to participate in future PlayStation betas across a wide range of PlayStation experiences. “

“The Beta Program at PlayStation will create an easy, centralized place for you to register your interest in a range of future PlayStation betas. A single registration for Beta Program at PlayStation will allow you to express interest in gaining beta access to test participating games for the PS5 console and PC, new PS5 console features, PlayStation App features, and even user experience features on PlayStation.com. You only need to sign up once to express interest in these various betas, and if you receive an invitation to a specific beta, it’s up to you to decide whether you’d like to participate or not.”

There are a few requirements before you sign up:

  • Players must have a valid account for PlayStation Network in good standing with a current email address. Accounts with restrictions or violations may not be eligible for participation.
  • Players must live in the region where Beta Program at PlayStation is available.
  • Players must meet the legal age requirement for their region.

If you get a pass for all of those you can head to playstation.com/beta-program-at-playstation/ and sign up. Please note that the beta program may not be available in all countries.


Source: PlayStation Blog
